title.rendered: Growing Better Funnels and Harvesting More Revenue

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow //gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo” css=”.vc_custom_1589928570441{margin-bottom: 9rem !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1561135322185{margin-right: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Find out how one agency uses SharpSpring every day to help agribusinesses excel in B2B outreach.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1616684748255{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]ReMarkAble Communicatie, a full-service agency serving the international agricultural and food sector, found that many of its clients were relying on outdated methods and struggling to reach their ideal customers.

Their clients were spending too much on outreach with no indication of who their qualified leads were. Meanwhile, their sales reps desperately needed a hand — and ReMarkAble itself needed a way to streamline outreach and position itself as the definitive marketing agency for their sector.

That’s why ReMarkAble was thrilled when they partnered with SharpSpring and were able to quickly identify high-ROI opportunities for their clients. The SharpSpring Revenue Growth Platform allowed ReMarkAble to:

  • Guide their clients toward better budget decisions.
  • Drive sales growth by tracking data and automating campaigns in one convenient platform.
  • Help clients use lead capture forms, email opt-ins, and other strategies to capture leads and nurture them until they’re ready to buy — saving valuable time and enabling them to scale up.

Learn all the juicy details on how ReMarkAble utilized SharpSpring to help their clients scale up and grow while saving valuable time in our latest case study.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
